title: Import Project lacks default folder in Import/Export feature
description: When using the Import/Export feature (Bug 23267), there is a missing default folder for Import Project.
OB: While importing an existing Eclipse project on Windows XP and clicking the Browse button, a dialog opens without a default folder.
EB: The expected behavior is that Import Project should have a default folder preselected. It would be convenient if the software could remember the last folder from which I've imported a project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software and navigate to the Import/Export feature.
2. Select 'Import Project.'
3. On Windows XP, click the 'Browse' button.
4. Observe that the dialog does not have a default folder preselected.
